reference.scope: X-RAY CRYSTALLOGRAPHY (2.0 ANGSTROMS) OF 9-364 IN COMPLEXES WITH SUBSTRATE ANALOGS AND ADP

comment.text: Catalyzes the phosphorylation of sphingosine to form sphingosine 1-phosphate (SPP), a lipid mediator with both intra- and extracellular functions. Also acts on D-erythro-sphingosine and to a lesser extent sphinganine, but not other lipids, such as D,L-threo-dihydrosphingosine, N,N-dimethylsphingosine, diacylglycerol, ceramide, or phosphatidylinositol.
ATP + a sphingoid base = ADP + a sphingoid base 1-phosphate.
Interacts with ACY1 (By similarity). Binds to calmodulin. Interacts with SPHKAP. Interacts with CIB1, the interaction occurs in a calcium-dependent manner.
Translocated from the cytoplasm to the plasma membrane in a CIB1-dependent manner.
Widely expressed with highest levels in adult liver, kidney, heart and skeletal muscle.
Sphingosine 1-phosphate stimulates TRAF2 E3 ubiquitin ligase activity, and promotes activation of NF-kappa-B in response to TNF signaling.

property.value: Association of TriC/CCT with target proteins during biosynthesis
P:positive regulation of mitotic cell cycle
P:positive regulation of NF-kappaB import into nucleus
P:positive regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity
P:positive regulation of smooth muscle contraction
P:regulation of tumor necrosis factor-mediated signaling pathway

feature.description: Abolishes interaction with CIB1; when associated with A-198.
Abolishes interaction with CIB1; when associated with A-197.
